name: Beefy Water Hole
description:
UE4 Environment showcasing Beefy Water Hole assets available on Marketplace.

Controls:
- Default character movement (WASD, ARROW KEYS, SPACEBAR)
- Shoot projectile (LEFT MOUSE BUTTON)
